feature.name: Shelter of the Faithful
feature.description: As a servant of a particular god, you have access to the temples and shrines of that god in any city.

name: Criminal
equipment: a set of dark common clothes including a hood

feature.name: Criminal Contact
feature.description: You have a reliable and trustworthy contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals.

name: Soldier
equipment: a trophy taken from a fallen enemy

feature.name: Military Rank
feature.description: You are a recognized rank within a military organization, granting you a degree of authority and influence with soldiers.
